explains: n. 做重活的人；驮马；重负荷机器
adj. 工作重的；吃苦耐劳的

sentences.en: For years the Apple II had been the workhorse in schools across America.
sentences.cn: 过去很多年里苹果II一直是全美学校的主要电脑。

sentences.en: My husband never paid any attention to me. I was just a workhorse bringing up three children.
sentences.cn: 我丈夫从来不关怀我，我只是一个养育了三个孩子的老妈子而已。

sentences.en: The Resource Description Framework (RDF) is the workhorse of the Semantic Web.
sentences.cn: 资源描述框架 (RDF) 是语义 Web 的主要组成。
